That sounds like good advice.  Fitness in NEAT indeed must be scaled 
to ab=
ove zero values.

Noisy domains present a problem for any method and requir=
e many 
trials to average out.  In some cases, noise can be so much that it=
 
makes learning impossible, which means the noise must be reduced.  In 
ge=
neral I suggest starting out with as little noise as possible to 
see what =
you can learn without it.

ken
